## PBReflection.tag() method

Creates multiple tags from an object that contains the tag names and the getter functions

**Signature:**

```typescript
tag(values: Record<string, PBReflectionTagGetter>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  values | Record&lt;string, [PBReflectionTagGetter](doc/markdown/./device.pbreflectiontaggetter.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The object that contains the tag names and the getter functions |

**Returns:**

void
